text: Joby Baker (born March 26, 1934) is a Canadian born actor and painter. He was born in Montreal, Quebec. Baker was known for his works with Walt Disney Studios where he appeared in The Adventures of Bullwhip Griffin (1966), Blackbeard's Ghost (1968) and Superdad (1974).
